name: LocalizationKit
description: LocalizationKit is a library designed to make managing localizations in .NET easier.

name: SettingsKit
description: Make managing settings in .NET applications easy

name: PlatformKit
description: PlatformKit is a C# .NET library focusing on dealing with cross-platform OS detection, OS version detection, platform specific code, and platform specific issues.

name: DeveloperKit
description: A C# .NET library to hold shared or common code to help many types of projects.

name: LundyPay Contactless
description: A free and open source alternative to Google Pay/Google Wallet.
